Room.Name: Hermit's Cave Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing outside the cave of Xandaus, a strange old man.
Room.LongDescription: Hermits are always strange, and for some reason they always seem to have long, flowing white hair and long beards. The one who lives here is no exception. He is also very wise. The outside of the cave is scattered with small animal bones and other bits of refuse. The skin of some unknown animal is stretched on a frame which provides a sort of door for the cave.
